name: simson tuningwerkstatt
description: This installer is for the download version not for steam!

files.installer: N/A:Provide path to the installer (.exe file)

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Provide path to the installer (.exe file)
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Simson Tuning-Werkstatt 3D/TuningWerkstatt.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
